template_info.name: Ice-Type Specialists
template_info.description: A frigid team focused on freeze effects, high damage, and controlling the battlefield with ice moves
template_info.usage_notes: Ice types hit hard but are fragile. Focus on getting powerful hits off before opponents can respond. Ice moves have great neutral coverage.
learning_objectives: Learning to work with fragile Pokemon

pokemon.name: lapras
pokemon.strategy: Bulky ice attacker with team support capabilities
pokemon.tips: Use Heal Bell to keep the team healthy while dealing consistent ice damage

pokemon.name: articuno
pokemon.strategy: Legendary ice/flying type with superior bulk
pokemon.tips: Roost removes flying type temporarily, reducing weaknesses

pokemon.name: jynx
pokemon.strategy: Fast special attacker with sleep support
pokemon.tips: Lovely Kiss puts opponents to sleep for free setup opportunities

pokemon.name: dewgong
pokemon.tips: Rest + Sleep Talk provides reliable recovery while staying active

pokemon.name: cloyster
pokemon.strategy: Extremely high defense wall with utility
pokemon.tips: Set up Spikes early, then use Rapid Spin to control hazards

pokemon.name: seel
pokemon.strategy: Physical ice attacker with solid bulk
pokemon.tips: Aurora Beam can lower opponent's attack while dealing damage
